name: utilities/config
description: Reads an attribute from config and templates object attributes into a string or object containing strings. This is not a configurable module.

properties.name: debit_account
properties.description: Account internal id to debit labour recovery journey lines.

properties.name: credit_account
properties.description: Account internal id to credit labour recovery journey lines.

properties.name: asset_profitability_report
properties.description: Field Service Asset Profitability Report internal id unique to the account.

properties.name: entity_profitability_report
properties.description: Field Service Entity Profitability Report internal id unique to the account.

properties.name: task
properties.description: Set of task type rules to apply a default billing type

properties.name: task[].project
properties.description: Project types to match on

properties.name: task[].case
properties.description: Case types to match on

properties.name: task[].task
properties.description: Task types to match on

properties.name: task[].billing
properties.description: Default Billing Type to set on task

properties.name: time
properties.description: Resolves to true if the time and task context should be billable

properties.name: expense
properties.description: Resolves to true if the expense category and task context should be billable

properties.name: consumable
properties.description: Resolves to true if the consumable and task context should be billable

members.name: icons
members.description: SVG Definitions with a 100 x 100 view box.

properties.name: defs
properties.description: Namespace for icon paths

properties.name: defs.default
properties.description: Flag icon path

properties.name: project
properties.description: Set of rules to generate a Program of Work for a Project.

members.name: tab
members.description: Tab internal ids. These properties are configured automaticatlly on install

properties.name: tab.transaction
properties.description: Label or internalid of the tab to attach form elements to.

properties.name: tab.entity
properties.description: Label or internalid of the tab to attach form elements to.

properties.name: tab.item
properties.description: Label or internalid of the tab to attach form elements to.

properties.name: tab.crm
properties.description: Label or internalid of the tab to attach form elements to.

properties.name: tab.asset
properties.description: Label or internalid of the tab to attach form elements to.

members.name: warranty
members.description: Warranty projects to create when an asset is created
